title: Exclusive Designer Duplex for Remote Work in Suwałki’s Most Tranquil District
description: Experience sophisticated countryside living in this newly constructed luxury duplex featuring 4 elegant bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms across 206 sqm. The heart of the home is its airy, sunlit open floor plan, with premium finishes and seamless accessibility throughout—absolutely wheelchair-friendly from entry to garden patio. Eco-conscious touches such as advanced recycling facilities create responsible comfort for today’s discerning resident.
neighborhood_description: Located in the peaceful Północne neighborhood of Suwałki, enjoy the best of safe, family-oriented surroundings amidst an artistic community. Spacious parks, vibrant playgrounds, and creative spaces are merely a stroll away, setting a new gold standard in quality of life without urban pressures. Rapid highway access makes regional connections effortless while preserving countryside serenity.
key_features: smart home elements for security and comfort
lifestyle_benefits: true privacy ideal for remote work balance
target_buyer: Successful professionals, remote workers, or families seeking quiet luxury, generous space, and seamless access to nature—those who value ease, creativity, and modern amenities in a safe, upscale environment.
market_positioning: Positioned at the pinnacle of Suwałki’s premium segment, this rare duplex offers a distinctive blend of contemporary design, accessible luxury, and countryside exclusivity, unmatched for remote professionals and modern family living.
